input.sentences: the town held it 's annual 5k race on a beautiful day .
there is also a festival that includes musical performances on race day .
organization sponsored the race and set up an outdoor store along with other vendors .
there was a large chess board on the grass that children could play on .
the book outlet also set up a display to sell books at the festival .
output.sentences: At the end of the 10k, there was an outdoor plaza where live music was being played.
Little kiosks were set up all around the plaza, including a Starbucks kiosk.
There was even a gigantic chess set laid out on the lawn for entertainment.
A book outlet had a table set up, also on the lawn, with a couple hundred books displayed.
